    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Source/Debugger/LogSource.h
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Source/Debugger/MenuSource.h
)

    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Include/RmlUi/Debugger.h
)

    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Include/RmlUi/Debugger/Debugger.h
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Include/RmlUi/Debugger/Header.h
)

    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Source/Debugger/DebuggerPlugin.cpp

)

set(Font_HDR_FILES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Source/Core/FontEngineDefault/FontEngineInterfaceDefault.h
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Source/Core/FontEngineDefault/FontFace.h
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Source/Core/FontEngineDefault/FontFaceHandleDefault.h

    )

    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Source/Core/FontEngineDefault/FontEngineInterfaceDefault.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Source/Core/FontEngineDefault/FontFace.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Source/Core/FontEngineDefault/FontFaceHandleDefault.cpp

    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Source/Core/FontEngineDefault/FontFamily.cpp

set(Lottie_HDR_FILES
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Source/Lottie/LottiePlugin.h
)

set(Lottie_PUB_HDR_FILES
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Include/RmlUi/Lottie/ElementLottie.h
)

set(Lottie_SRC_FILES
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Source/Lottie/ElementLottie.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Source/Lottie/LottiePlugin.cpp
)


add_wn_library(RmlUi
  INCLUDES
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmlui/Include
  SOURCES
    ${Core_HDR_FILES}
    ${MASTER_Core_PUB_HDR_FILES}
    ${Core_PUB_HDR_FILES}
    ${Core_SRC_FILES}
    ${Debugger_HDR_FILES}
    ${MASTER_Debugger_PUB_HDR_FILES}
    ${Debugger_PUB_HDR_FILES}
    ${Debugger_SRC_FILES}
    ${Font_HDR_FILES}
    ${Font_SRC_FILES}
    ${Lottie_HDR_FILES}
    ${Lottie_PUB_HDR_FILES}
    ${Lottie_SRC_FILES}
  PUBLIC_COMPILE_DEFINES
    RMLUI_STATIC_LIB
    RMLUI_USE_CUSTOM_RTTI
    RMLUI_ENABLE_LOTTIE_PLUGIN
    CHOBO_FLAT_MAP_NO_THROW
  LIBS
    freetype
    rlottie
)
